page.title: 18Hobbies and Recreations.
page.content: The young people I spoke to liked to play football or cricket, riding their B.M.X. bikes, pony riding and joining Cubs and Brownies. Middle-aged people like playing a game of bowls, watching football, doing home improvements, boating, fishing and gardening. Old people enjoy playing cards, reading, gardening, watching television and joining old-people's clubs. My favourite hobby is B.M.X.(Bicycle Motor Cross). It is very hard because you need a decent B.M.X., a helmet, shoulder and knee pads. All that costs about Â£170. (D.R.) I go to 1st Woodbridge Cubs every Friday.It goes on for 2 hours. I pay 30p for subs. We do such things as cooking, finding trails and setting-up tents. (A.R.) My pastimes are sewing and knitting. I am knitting a sweater for Oxfam.(H.S.)
